category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Eliminate Toxins

action.primary: Clears Heat, soothes the throat, eliminates toxins and alleviates pain

indications: Throat disorders due to Heat such as soreness, swelling and abscesses, cough, aphonia, acute laryngitis
Gastrointestinal disorders due to Stomach Heat such as abdominal pain and diarrhea, vomiting, epistaxis
Topically for dermatological disorders such as carbuncles, furuncles, sores, mosquito and other insect bites, ulcers and incised wound toxins

contraindications: Use with caution for those with Spleen and Stomach Deficiencies.
